column5: I hate sitting indoors, so grab my gear and the trusty backpack. A few back ponds just have skim ice here in Niagara. Hasn't been quite cold enough for real ice making. Must have covered a mile of shoreline  looking for some action. NADA Been a while since I got me a white stripe, but it has to happen sooner or later.
Bigugli, you were humming the wrong song while fishing.  Change your tune and the fish will come.
I even tried the secret Finnglish fish call
You picked the wrong day Bruce try after monday when the rain melts the ice.
Every day is the right day as long as I can get outside and breathe in the free air.
I know exactly what you mean Bruce
